description.raw:
* General structure of competition plugin
* One checkpoint: go to pick-up area, with an area hardcoded on the SDF
* Time-based score
* This requires Gazebo 8.3 to fully work, that should be released in the coming days. Until then, the code will compile and run, but Gazebo will say it can't find `libContainPlugin.so`, so the checkpoint can't be completed
* Everything on the [Walkthrough](#!/osrf/servicesim/wiki/Walkthrough) should work up to checkpoint 1, including:

    * `rostopic echo /servicesim/score`
    * `rosservice call /servicesim/new_task`
